text: <@U1H7ZPXEW> When will the UI of STL marketplace release? Is there any plan?
<@U1ZUSJHAA> We’re still fitting in the open source release in with other higher priorities.  Slow progress, but getting there. Sorry I can’t give any ETA at this point.
"GenesisLedger" is now neither a config option, nor a property of validators/jounrnals

check out <https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/blob/master/docs/source/tutorial/genesis.sh> to see a minimal example of preparing an initial validator.  Note that InitialConnectivity has to be zero for 'initial validator'
